item.title: 埃里克-亚当斯市长谈纽约市的未来
item.description:
他解决城市最大挑战的愿景

His vision for solving the city's biggest challenges

】

item.title: 奇货可居：亚当斯市长谈纽约市的未来（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：亚当斯市长谈纽约市的未来（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Mayor Adams on the Future of New York City (Podcast)】

item.title: Zara 创始人疯狂交易，为 1040 亿美元避税
item.description: Zara 创始人阿曼西奥-奥尔特加（Amancio Ortega）的私人投资公司正在全球范围内大肆进行交易，最近几周收购了一连串有价值的资产，因为他正试图利用其不断扩大的财富来规避财富税。【原文：Zara founder Amancio Ortega’s private investment firm is on a global deal spree, picking up a string of trophy assets in recent weeks as he seeks to deploy his expanding fortune to avoid wealth taxes.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长认为美国将根据新提案削减 36% 的关税
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，在新一轮谈判中提出 "非常实质性的改进 "后，泰国希望美国将对其出口产品征收的关税从 36% 降至与地区邻国一致的水平。【原文：Thailand expects the US to reduce a threatened tariff on its exports from 36% to a level in line with regional neighbors after presenting a “very substantial improvement” in a fresh round of talks, Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said.】

item.title: 日本借助 Rapidus 的首款芯片原型向人工智能目标迈进
item.description: 日本 Rapidus 公司研制出了一种先进的芯片原型，这是这家由政府支持的初创企业在数十亿美元公共资金的帮助下，试图跨越多年创新历程的第一步。【原文：Japan’s Rapidus Corp. has prototyped an advanced chip, an early step in the government-backed startup’s attempt to leapfrog years of innovation with the help of billions of dollars in public funding.】

item.title: 芯片设计商 Semifive 申请韩国上市前审查
item.description: 芯片设计公司 Semifive Inc. 在首尔提交了首次公开募股的初步申请，寻求刺激公司发展，以满足人工智能等领域对半导体不断增长的需求。【原文：Chip design firm Semifive Inc. filed a preliminary application for an initial public offering in Seoul, seeking to spur its growth to tap rising demand for semiconductors in fields such as artificial intelligence.】

item.title: DigiPlus 因电子博彩业暴跌 70% 而成为全球最差赌场股
item.description: DigiPlus Interactive 公司从世界上最热门的赌场股票之一变成了绝对最差的股票，因为菲律宾正在采取行动遏制在线赌博。【原文：DigiPlus Interactive Corp. has turned from one of the world’s hottest casino stocks to the absolute worst as the Philippines moves to curb online gambling.】

item.title: Valterra 上半年利润因销售额下降和拆分成本而下滑
item.description: Valterra Platinum Ltd.称，由于销售额下降以及今年早些时候从英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）剥离的相关成本，上半年利润可能下降高达98%。【原文：Valterra Platinum Ltd. said first-half profit likely fell as much as 98% due to a drop in sales and costs related to the company’s spinoff from Anglo American Plc earlier this year.】

item.title: 日本债券收益率下滑，交易员为不确定的大选导航
item.description: 在周日备受关注的日本上议院选举之前，日本政府债券周五反弹，各期限债券收益率均有所下降。【原文：Japanese government bonds rallied Friday, with yields dropping across maturities, ahead of Sunday’s closely-watched upper house election.】

item.title: 贸易战受阻后中国提升稀土产品出口
item.description: 中国的稀土产品出口在 6 月份大幅增长，这表明在政府实施限制措施之后，磁铁供应有可能回升，而这些限制措施已被证明是中国政府在与特朗普政府的贸易战中最有力的武器。【原文：China’s exports of rare-earth products jumped in June, pointing to a potential pickup in magnet supplies after government-imposed curbs that proved to be Beijing’s most powerful weapon in its trade war with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将继续上涨，英镑兑美元贬值
英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋成为中美冲突中不情愿的使者
item.description: 在白宫与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会面几天后，黄仁勋在北京的舞台上受到观众的欢呼。【原文：Days after a White House meeting with President Donald Trump, Jensen Huang was being hailed by an audience on a stage in Beijing.】

item.title: 台积电称外汇是 "重大不确定因素"，誓言不断审查对冲措施
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司首席财务官 Wendell Huang 表示，汇率波动对其利润率而言是一个 "巨大的不确定性"，公司将不断审查对冲策略，以控制影响。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. sees currency volatility as a “big uncertainty” to its margins and will constantly review hedging strategies to manage the impact, said Chief Financial Officer Wendell Huang.】

item.title: 日本官员敦促中国扩大外商投资配额
item.description: 一位日本政府官员呼吁中国扩大允许某些大陆投资者将更多资金投入海外的计划，理由是对日本股票的 "强烈热情"。【原文：A Japanese government official called on China to expand a program allowing certain mainland investors to put more money abroad, citing “strong enthusiasm” for Japanese stocks.】

item.title: 中国零食制造商降价 45% 后寻求政府支持
item.description: 一家降价 45% 的中国零食生产商现在计划让地方政府成为其最大股东，这表明世界第二大经济体的严重通货紧缩正在造成企业伤亡，并要求国家加强干预。【原文：A Chinese snacks maker that cut prices by 45% now plans to make the local government its largest shareholder, in a sign of how bruising deflation in the world’s second-biggest economy is claiming corporate casualties and requiring growing state intervention.】

item.title: 一支反叛军正在中国边境建立稀土帝国
item.description:
克钦独立组织数十年来一直默默无闻。现在，它正在为世界各地的制造商提供必需的矿产品。【原文：

The Kachin Independence Organization fought for decades in obscurity. Now it’s supplying essential minerals to manufacturers around the world.

】

item.title: 美国股票很贵。你仍应购买
item.description:
在本期Merryn Talks Money节目中，摩根大通私人银行的 Nataliia Lipikhina 解释了其中的原因。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, Nataliia Lipikhina of J.P. Morgan Private Bank explains why.

】

item.title: 尽管存在贸易风险，马来西亚经济增长仍意外加速
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推出全球关税政策的背景下，马来西亚第二季度的经济增长速度在服务业的推动下超过预期。【原文：Malaysia’s economy grew faster than expected in the second quarter, driven by the services sector, even as the country contends with US President Donald Trump’s rollout of global tariffs.】

item.title: 调查显示欧洲央行可能等到 12 月才会最终降息
item.description: 彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，欧洲央行可以将最后一次降息推迟到12月，而投资者在此期间不会得出宽松政策已经结束的结论。【原文：The European Central Bank can delay its final interest-rate cut until December without investors concluding in the meantime that easing is over, a Bloomberg survey of economists showed.】

item.title: 通过清洁烹饪计划向非洲提供资金和碳信用额度
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，在过去的一年里，数亿美元涌入非洲，预计还会有更多的资金涌入，作为在非洲大陆终止有害烹饪方法的努力的一部分。【原文：Hundreds of millions of dollars poured into Africa over the past year, with more expected, as part of an effort to end harmful cooking methods on the continent, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 拨备攀升，利润令人失望，安信银行股价暴跌
item.description: 周五，印度安讯士银行（Axis Bank Ltd. ）股价创下一年来最大跌幅，原因是该银行公布的第一季度净利润大幅低于分析师预期，这主要是由于不良贷款拨备激增。【原文：Axis Bank Ltd.’s shares fell the most in a year on Friday after the Indian lender reported first-quarter net income that was sharply below analysts’ expectations, driven by a surge in provisions for bad loans.】

item.title: 首席财务官称，台积电在宏观不确定性下 "谨慎 "支出
item.description: 台湾半导体制造股份有限公司首席财务官 Wendell Huang 表示，由于关税相关的不确定性，该公司计划对资本支出持谨慎态度。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. plans to be cautious with capital expenditure due to tariff-related uncertainties, according to Chief Financial Officer Wendell Huang.】

item.title: 特朗普人工智能指导方针有望放松规则、追求能源
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统预计将宣布人工智能政策指导方针，要求放宽监管并扩大数据中心的能源来源，同时敦促国会考虑通过联邦立法，免除各州对这一新兴技术的监督。【原文：President Donald Trump is expected to announce policy guidelines for artificial intelligence that will call for easing regulation and expanding energy sources for data centers, while urging Congress to consider federal legislation to preempt state oversight of the emerging technology.】

item.title: 印度市场或因关键收益不及预期而延续周度跌势
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 香港保险公司 Bowtie 从阳光人寿融资最多 7000 万美元
item.description: Bowtie Life Insurance Co. 在由 Sun Life Financial Inc.【原文：Bowtie Life Insurance Co. has secured up to $70 million in a private funding round led by Sun Life Financial Inc.’s Hong Kong unit.】

item.title: 中国本周注入一月份以来最多短期现金
item.description: 本周，中国加大了向银行系统注入短期现金的力度，达到1月份以来的最高水平，以补充因纳税和大量发行政府债券而消耗的资金。【原文：China ramped up its short-term cash injection into the banking system to the highest since January this week as it sought to replenish funds drained by tax payments and heavy government debt issuance.】

item.title: 香港建筑商英皇修改债务计划，寻求贷款延期
item.description: 香港房地产市场的低迷正在拖累一系列本地开发商，最近一家知名但规模较小的建筑商向债权人寻求救济。【原文：Hong Kong’s property slump is weighing on a range of local developers, with a well-known but smaller-scale builder the latest to seek relief from creditors.】

item.title: 中国在岸债券的一个关键卖点消失了
item.description: 吸引外国资金流入中国在岸债券的一种一度流行的交易正在失去吸引力，有可能引发资金外流的扩大。【原文：A once-popular trade that drew foreign funds into Chinese onshore bonds is losing its appeal, threatening to trigger an extended bout of outflows.】

item.title: 印度 HDFC 和 ICICI 银行因信贷增长乏力和利率下调而利润缩水
item.description: 印度顶级私人银行 HDFC Bank Ltd. 和 ICICI Bank Ltd. 本周末将公布财报，它们的利润可能会受到贷款增长创三年新低以及央行降息导致利润率下降的压力。【原文：India’s top private-sector banks HDFC Bank Ltd. and ICICI Bank Ltd. could see profits come under pressure from loan growth at a three-year low and thinning margins driven by central bank rate cuts, as they report earnings this weekend.】

item.title: 美国对中国征收 93% 的关税，电池材料制造商股票大涨
item.description: 在美国商务部对从中国进口的石墨征收 93.5% 的初步反倾销税后，电池材料制造商的股票攀升。【原文：Battery material makers’ stocks climbed after the US Commerce Department imposed preliminary anti-dumping duties of 93.5% on graphite imports from China.】
